means: （志趣相投、尤指来自同一地方的）一组与会者( contingent的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: There were contingents from the navies of virtually all EU countries.
sentence.Network_cn: 几乎欧盟各国都派出了海军分队。

sentence.Network_en: We were forced to rely on French contingents.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们势必被迫依恃法国驻军.

sentence.Network_en: The internal security forces are composed of contingents and mobile divisions.
sentence.Network_cn: 内卫部队由各总队和机动师组成.

PerfectNetExp.abs: The internal security forces are composed of contingents and mobile divisions ., 内卫部队由各总队和机动师组成.
My son Tom heads up the contingents ., 我的儿子汤姆走在队伍的最前面.
All three contingents have abandoned their old positions and moved to new regions ., 这三支红军 , 都放弃了原有阵地 , 转移到新地区去.

权变理论（contingency theory）（Contingency Theory）的核心概念是指世界上没有一成不变的管理模式。管理与其说是一门理论，更不如说是一门实操性 …
权变理論（Contingency Theory）以及转型領导理論(Transformational Leadership

entry.tran: (警察、军队或军用车辆的)分遣队，小分队
entry.def: A contingent of police, soldiers, or military vehicles is a group of them.

example.ex: Nigeria provided a large contingent of troops to the West African Peacekeeping Force...
example.tran: 尼日利亚向西非维和部队派遣了一大批军队。

example.ex: There were contingents from the navies of virtually all EU countries.
example.tran: 几乎欧盟各国都派出了海军分队。

entry.tran: 代表团;代表队;代表群体
entry.def: A contingent is a group of people representing a country or organization at a meeting or other event.

example.ex: The strong British contingent suffered mixed fortunes...
example.tran: 实力雄厚的英国军团喜忧参半。

example.ex: The whistles from the large contingent of England fans away to our left are deafening.
example.tran: 我们左边一大群英格兰球迷发出震耳欲聋的口哨声。

entry.def: If something is contingent on something else, the first thing depends on the second in order to happen or exist.

example.ex: In effect, growth is contingent on improved incomes for the mass of the low-income population.
example.tran: 事实上，发展有赖于大量低收入人群收入的增长。

auth_sentence.content: Moreover, fierce quarrels among the French, German and English contingents provided further troubles.
auth_sentence.res_content: Moreover, fierce quarrels among the French, German and English contingents provided further troubles.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Moreover, fierce quarrels among the French, German and English contingents provided further troubles.
